exceptions.tactic: apply plus_eq_compat_l with (p * n') in Hr.
exceptions.exn: The reference plus_eq_compat_l was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- Nat.add_sub_assoc in Hr; try auto.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "?M1467 + ?M1468 - ?M1469" in Hr.

original: destruct (div_full q p) as [n [r [Hqr Hr]]]. destruct (Nat.eq_dec r 0) as [Hr0 | Hr0]. - left. exists n. rewrite Hr0 in Hqr. rewrite Nat.add_0_r in Hqr. apply Hqr. - right. intro H. destruct H as [n' H]. rewrite H in Hqr. apply plus_eq_compat_l with (p * n') in Hr. rewrite <- Nat.add_sub_assoc in Hr; try auto. rewrite <- Hr in Hqr. rewrite Nat.sub_diag in Hqr. simpl in Hqr. apply Nat.add_0_r in Hqr. pose (Nat.mul_le_mono_pos_l p 0 n' HpO) as Hpn'. rewrite <- Hqr in Hpn'. apply Hpn'.
